channel.title: Banner
channel.description:
I'm not sure if this is where this goes, but can we request graphics on here? if not then you can close this, or if it's in wrong section move it.
But I wanted to see if anyone could make me a banner for my forums http://awsomepk.smfforfree3.com could you just make it say AwesomePk and have a picture or something, just be crative? :D
